SEARCH
Package model

Class Photo

java.lang.Object
model.Photo
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Photo extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a photo in the application This class contains details about the photo such as its file path, the date it was taken, a caption, and any tags associated with it. It also provides functionality to manage these properties.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Photo

      public Photo(String path)
      Creates a new Photo with the specified file path. The date taken is set to the current time, and the default caption is assigned. Initializes an empty list of tags.
      Parameters:
      path - The file path of the photo.

  • Method Details

    • addTag

      public boolean addTag(String key, String value)
      Adds a tag to the photo. If a tag with the same key and value already exists, it is not added again.
      Parameters:
      key - The key of the tag.
      value - The value of the tag.
      Returns:
      true if the tag was added, false if it already exists.

    • removeTag

      public void removeTag(String key)
      Removes a tag from the photo by its key.
      Parameters:
      key - The key of the tag to be removed.

    • getFilePath

      public Path getFilePath()
      Gets the file path of the photo as a Path object.
      Returns:
      The file path.

    • setFilePathString

      public void setFilePathString(String filePathString)
      Sets the file path string of the photo.
      Parameters:
      filePathString - The new file path string.

    • getDateTaken

      public LocalDateTime getDateTaken()
      Gets the date when the photo was taken.
      Returns:
      The date taken.

    • setDateTaken

      public void setDateTaken(LocalDateTime dateTaken)
      Sets the date when the photo was taken.
      Parameters:
      dateTaken - The new date taken.

    • getCaption

      public String getCaption()
      Gets the caption of the photo.
      Returns:
      The caption.

    • setCaption

      public void setCaption(String caption)
      Sets the caption of the photo.
      Parameters:
      caption - The new caption.

    • getTags

      public List<Tag> getTags()
      Gets the list of tags associated with the photo.
      Returns:
      The list of tags.

    • getImage

      public javafx.scene.image.Image getImage()
      Returns an Image object for displaying in the GUI. If the file path is invalid or the image cannot be loaded, returns null.
      Returns:
      The Image object or null.
